medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started without any associated events, initially located in the periumbilical/epigastric area. By the next day, pain had migrated to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). The patient noticed the pain worse with coughing and palpation. Pain increased yesterday, reaching a level of intensity by the time he called his NP and was advised to visit his PCP, who then referred him to the ED.
